author: Paramount Plus
description:
Get ready for 26 minutes of pure adrenaline! From the iconic opening scene with Drew Barrymore to Sidney Prescott’s (Neve Campbell) relentless fight for survival, these are the most terrifying, blood-pumping moments that made Wes Craven’s masterpiece a genre classic. Alongside Gale Weathers (Courteney Cox), Dewey Riley (David Arquette), and other unforgettable characters played by Jamie Kennedy, Parker Posey, and Liev Schreiber, this trilogy delivers nonstop scares, twists, and dark humor.

Stream Scream, Scream 2, and Scream 3 on Paramount+.

title: Scariest Scenes From Scream 1, 2, and 3 | Paramount+
